main event: Multiple witnesses observed unusual lights in the sky over Paterson, NJ in October 1960.
interesting points: The first light appeared as a steady glow across the horizon lasting about 10 minutes and seemed to descend slowly,Second light was a rapid moving light observed shortly after the first,Third light moved steadily and appeared to wink out rather than disappear,Report suggests that the object could be a meteor, balloon or other unidentified aerial phenomena.
witness description: A person who saw multiple lights in the sky and described their movements and characteristics.
